headline: Fortinet (FTNT) Downgraded to Hold: Analyst Warns of Slower Growth Ahead
summary: Fortinet, Inc. (NASDAQ:FTNT) is one of the AI Stocks On Wall Street’s Radar. On August 14, Erste Group analyst Hans Engel downgraded the stock from Buy to Hold. The downgrade comes amid concerns about the company’s operating margins and future growth prospects. “Revenue this year should be in the range of around USD 6.7 – 6.8 […]

headline: FTNT Rides on Strong Billings Trend: Will the Momentum Sustain?
summary: Fortinet sustains double-digit billings growth, boosted by cloud services, large enterprise wins and a raised full-year outlook.

headline: FTNT vs. QLYS: Which Cybersecurity Stock Deserves Your Investment?
summary: Qualys' AI-powered innovation & 82% margins outshine Fortinet's growth concerns. Buy QLYS for superior tech. Hold FTNT for a better entry point.
